author: Thomas Ricker
title: The 2020 Tokyo Olympics have been postponed
description: The 2020 Tokyo Olympics, which were scheduled to begin this summer on July 24th, have been postponed. It’s the first time in their 124-year modern history that the games have been moved or delayed during peacetime.
content:
Due to concerns over the spread of COVID-19
Photo by PHILIP FONG/AFP via Getty Images
The 2020 Summer Olympic Games, scheduled to open in Tokyo on July 24th, have been postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The games will be rescheduled, according to Japan… [+1965 chars]
